rooms.name: Armoury
rooms.description:
You enter into a room for security guards; too bad about them.
Black goo oozes from the ceiling. Hoarse breathing calls to you.
There is one exit to the east.

rooms.name: Unknown
rooms.description:
There's nothing special here.
There are exits to the north, east, and west.

rooms.name: Unknown
rooms.description:
There's nothing special here.
There are exits to the north, south, and east.

rooms.name: Crying
rooms.description:
There's blood on the west wall. You hear faint crying to the north. It sounds human.
There are exits to the north, east, and south.

rooms.name: Boss fight
rooms.description:
What is that thing?
There are exits to the north, east, and south.
You can't leave until you fight it.

rooms.name: Crying
rooms.description:
There's blood on the west wall. You hear faint crying to the south. It sounds human.
There are exits to the south and east.

rooms.name: Unknown
rooms.description:
There's nothing special here. You feel uneasy.
There are exits to the east, south, and west.

rooms.name: Unknown
rooms.description:
There's nothing special here.
There are exits to the north, east, and west.

rooms.name: Red Circle Room
rooms.description:
There's a red circle on the wall.
There are exits to the east and west.

rooms.name: Unknown
rooms.description:
It's unclear where you are. You feel safe here.
There are exits to the north and east.

rooms.name: Unknown
rooms.description:
The lights flicker as you enter. You don't know where you are.
There are exits to the east, south, and west.

rooms.name: Exit
rooms.description: You're free.

rooms.name: Unknown
rooms.description:
There's nothing special here. You feel a draft from the south. Light trickles in through the slotted window.
There are exits to the north, south, and west.

rooms.name: Unknown
rooms.description:
There's nothing special here.
There are exits to the north, south, east, and west.

rooms.name: Unknown
rooms.description:
There's nothing special here.
There are exits to the north, south, and west.

rooms.name: Red room
rooms.description:
You enter into a room lit entirely by red lights.
There are exits to the north, south, east, and west.

rooms.name: Unknown
rooms.description:
There's nothing special here.
There are exits to the east, south, and west.

rooms.name: Cafeteria
rooms.description:
You enter into a corporate cafeteria. One flickering light is all that allows you to see. 
There is an exit to the west.

rooms.name: Infirmary
rooms.description:
You enter into an infirmary. A strange sense of comfort overrides you. Then a thud.
There are exits to the north and east.

rooms.name: Unknown
rooms.description: There are exits to the south and west.
